attributes.action: Award Captain (Retd) Tom Moore a Knighthood for his charity work.
attributes.additional_details: This man has shown bravery. he had the courage to stand up and act in support of our national interests at a time of crisis. He is truly selfless and deserves recognition.
attributes.background: Add Captain Thomas Moore to the Honours List as a Knight for his outstanding service and charity work during the Corona Virus.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 
Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
